00021 static int default_series_color[] = {
00022     V_BLUE,
00023     V_GREEN,
00024     V_RED,
00025     V_YELLOW,
00026     V_VIOLET,
00027     V_BROWN,
00028     V_ORANGE,
00029     V_PINK,
00030     V_BLACK,
00031     V_WHITE,

00065 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::init --------//
00099 void GraphMonth::init(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2,
00100                       int seriesNum, int *dataNum,
00101                       void *dataArray, char dataTypeFlag,
00102                       int thisMonthIndicator,
00103                       char *xLabel, char *yLabel,
00104                       char **legendArray, char transparentFlag,
00105                       char orientationFlag, char valueFlag,
00106                       int numFormat, int *seriesColor, int axisColor) {
00107     err_when(seriesNum > DEFAULT_SERIES_COLOR_NUM && !seriesColor);
00108     err_when(seriesNum <= 0);
00109 
00110     graph_width = x2 - x1 - 6;
00111 
00112     err_when(graph_width < 0);
00113 
00114     graph_x1 = x1;
00115     graph_y1 = y1;
00116     graph_x2 = x2;
00117     graph_y2 = y2;
00118     series_num = seriesNum;
00119     data_num = dataNum;
00120     data_array = dataArray;
00121     data_type_flag = dataTypeFlag;
00122 
00123     x_label = xLabel;
00124     y_label = yLabel;
00125     legend_array = legendArray;
00126 
00127     transparent_flag = transparentFlag;
00128     orientation_flag = orientationFlag;
00129     value_flag = valueFlag;
00130     num_format = numFormat;
00131 
00132     series_color = seriesColor ? seriesColor : default_series_color;
00133     axis_color = axisColor;
00134 
00135     init_flag = 1;
00136     this_month_indicator = thisMonthIndicator;
00137     y_label_max_len = font_chartsm.text_width(MAX_LEN_LABEL);
00138     set_font(&font_chartsm);
00139 }
00140

00143 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::deinit ------------//
00145 void GraphMonth::deinit() {
00146     if (graph_bitmap) {
00147         mem_del(graph_bitmap);
00148         graph_bitmap = NULL;
00149     }
00150 
00151     init_flag = 0;
00152 }

00156 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::set_font ------------//
00158 void GraphMonth::set_font(Font *fontPtr) {
00159     if (!init_flag)
00160         return;
00161 
00162     font_ptr = fontPtr;
00163 
00164     calc_pos();
00165 }
00166 
00167 //------------- End of function GraphMonth::set_font ---------//

00169 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::calc_pos ------------//
00174 void GraphMonth::calc_pos() {
00175     if (legend_array) {
00176         short textWidth = 0, textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00177 
00178         for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00179             if (font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]) > textWidth)
00180                 textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]);
00181         }
00182 
00183         err_when(textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING * 2 > graph_width);
00184 
00185         legend_x_num = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / (textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING*2);
00186         legend_y_num = (series_num / legend_x_num) + ((series_num % legend_x_num) ? 1 : 0);
00187 
00188         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - legend_y_num * (textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING) - 6;
00189 
00190         err_when(graph_height <= 0);
00191 
00192         legend_width = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / legend_x_num;
00193         legend_height = textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING;
00194     }
00195     else {
00196         legend_width = legend_height = legend_x_num = legend_y_num = 0;
00197         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - 6;
00198     }
00199 
00200     short YLabelWidth = y_label ? (orientation_flag ? font_ptr->max_font_height : font_ptr->text_width(y_label)) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00201     short XLabelHeight = x_label ? (font_ptr->max_font_height) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00202     series_x1 = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*4 + YLabelWidth + y_label_max_len;
00203     series_y1 = graph_y1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*6;
00204     series_x2 = graph_x2 - 34 - COMMON_OFFSET*16;
00205     series_y2 = graph_y1 + graph_height - COMMON_OFFSET*3 - (font_ptr->max_font_height);
00206 }
00207 
00208 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::calc_pos ---------//

00210 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::paint --------------//
00212 void GraphMonth::paint() {
00213     if (transparent_flag) {
00214         user_interface.brighten(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+4, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2);
00215         if (legend_array)
00216             draw_legend();
00217         draw_axis_label();
00218         graph_bitmap = vga_back.save_area(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+4, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2, graph_bitmap);
00219     }
00220 
00221     //  paint_flag = 1;
00222     refresh();
00223 }
00224 
00225 //------------- End of function GraphMonth::paint -----------//
00226 
00227 //-------- Begin of function GraphMonth::refresh ------------//
00229 void GraphMonth::refresh() {
00230     if (transparent_flag) {
00231         user_interface.rect(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2, 1);
00232         vga_back.rest_area(graph_bitmap, 0, 0);
00233     }
00234     else {
00235         user_interface.bar(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2);
00236         user_interface.panel(graph_x1+3, graph_y1+3, graph_x2-4, graph_y2-4);
00237     }
00238     if (legend_array)
00239         draw_legend();
00240     draw_scale();
00241     draw_series();
00242 
00243     //  if (!paint_flag)
00244     //          vga.blt_buf(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2+2, graph_y2+2);
00245     //  else
00246     //          paint_flag = 0;
00247 }

00251 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_legend ------------//
00253 void GraphMonth::draw_legend() {
00254     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00255         short legendX = graph_x1 + 4 + (i % legend_x_num) * legend_width + LEGEND_X_SPACING;
00256         short legendY = graph_y1 + 4 + graph_height + (i / legend_x_num) * legend_height;
00257         user_interface.bar( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE/2-1,
00258                             legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE/2+1,
00259                             series_color[i] );
00260         font_ptr->put( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING*2+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING, legend_array[i] );
00261     }
00262 }
00263 
00264 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::draw_legend ------------//

00266 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_axis_label --------//
00268 void GraphMonth::draw_axis_label() {
00269     short textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00270 
00271     if (x_label) {
00272         font_ptr->center_put( series_x1, series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textHeight,
00273                               series_x2, graph_y1+graph_height-COMMON_OFFSET, x_label );
00274     }
00275 
00276     if (y_label) {
00277         short textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(y_label) + 1;
00278 
00279         if (orientation_flag) {
00280             short *fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00281             err_when(textWidth * textHeight * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE);
00282 
00283             for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00284                 *fontBuf++ = transparent_code_w;
00285 
00286             font_ptr->put_to_bufferW(fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, y_label);
00287 
00288             short xStart = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET * 2;
00289             short yStart = (series_y1 + series_y2 - textWidth) / 2;
00290 
00291             for (short x = 0; x < textHeight; x++) {
00292                 for (short y = textWidth - 1; y >= 0; y--, fontBuf++) {
00293                     if (*fontBuf != transparent_code_w)
00294                         *vga_back.buf_ptr(xStart+x, yStart+y) = *fontBuf;
00295                 }
00296             }
00297         }
00298         else {
00299             font_ptr->center_put( graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_y1,
00300                                   graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textWidth, series_y2, y_label);
00301         }
00302     }
00303 }

00307 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::find_scale -------------//
00309 void GraphMonth::find_scale() {
00310     //  double data , maxVal = 0.0,minVal = 0.0;
00311     double data = 0.0, maxVal = 0.0,minVal = 0.0;   //## chea try to fix the freeze
00312 
00313     for (int i = 0; i < series_num * *data_num; i++) {
00314         switch (data_type_flag) {
00315         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00316             data = ((double*)data_array)[i];
00317             break;
00318         case DATA_FLOAT:
00319             data = double(((float*)data_array)[i]);
00320             break;
00321         case DATA_INT:
00322             data = double(((int*)data_array)[i]);
00323             break;
00324         case DATA_LONG:
00325             data = double(((long*)data_array)[i]);
00326             break;
00327         }
00328         if (data > maxVal)
00329             maxVal = data;
00330         if (data < minVal)
00331             minVal = data;
00332     }
00333     if (maxVal>0)
00334         max_scale = maxVal;
00335     else
00336         max_scale = 10;
00337 
00338     if (minVal<0)
00339         min_scale = minVal;
00340     else
00341         min_scale = 0;
00342 
00343 }
00344 
00345 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::find_scale -------------//
00346 
00347 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_scale -------------//
00349 void GraphMonth::draw_scale() {
00350     find_scale();
00351 
00352     //------ Draw y-axis -------//
00353     vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y1-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x1+1, series_y2, axis_color);
00354 
00355     xAxisPos=(short)(series_y1+(series_y2-series_y1)*(max_scale)/(max_scale-min_scale));
00356 
00357     posScaleNum = (xAxisPos-series_y1-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00358     if ( posScaleNum > 0 )
00359         posScaleNum = short(pow(2,floor(log10(double(posScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00360     else
00361         posScaleNum = 0;
00362     negScaleNum = (series_y2-xAxisPos-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00363     if ( negScaleNum > 0 )
00364         negScaleNum = short(pow(2,ceil(log10(double(negScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00365     else
00366         negScaleNum = 0;
00367 
00368 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00369     if ( posScaleNum + negScaleNum <= 0) {
00370         posScaleNum = 1;
00371         negScaleNum = 0;
00372     }
00373 #endif
00374 
00375     short posScaleStep;
00376     short negScaleStep;
00377 
00378     if(posScaleNum<1) {
00379         posScaleStep = 0;
00380         posScaleInc = 0;
00381     }
00382     else {
00383         posScaleStep  = (xAxisPos-series_y1) / posScaleNum;
00384         posScaleInc   = max_scale / posScaleNum;
00385 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00386         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00387             posScaleInc = ceil(posScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral posScaleInc
00388 #endif
00389     }
00390 
00391     if(negScaleNum<1) {
00392         negScaleStep = 0;
00393         negScaleInc = 0;
00394     }
00395     else {
00396         negScaleStep = (series_y2-xAxisPos) / negScaleNum;
00397         negScaleInc   = -min_scale / negScaleNum;
00398 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00399         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00400             negScaleInc = ceil(negScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral negScaleInc
00401 #endif
00402     }
00403 
00404     if(posScaleNum+negScaleNum<1) {
00405         scaleStep = 0;
00406         scaleInc   = 0;
00407     }
00408     else {
00409         scaleStep = (short)((series_y2-series_y1)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00410         scaleInc = ((max_scale-min_scale)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00411 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00412         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00413             scaleInc = max(posScaleInc, negScaleInc);
00414 #endif
00415     }
00416 
00417     double scaleValue;
00418 
00419     for (int i = -negScaleNum,ycheck=xAxisPos-i*scaleStep;
00420          ycheck>graph_y1;
00421          i++,ycheck-=scaleStep) {
00422 
00423         vga_back.bar(series_x1, ycheck, series_x1+COMMON_OFFSET*2, ycheck, axis_color);
00424 
00425         scaleValue = i*scaleInc;
00426 
00427         switch (data_type_flag) {
00428         case DATA_FLOAT:
00429         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00430             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, ycheck-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(scaleValue,num_format));
00431             break;
00432         case DATA_INT:
00433         case DATA_LONG:
00434             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, ycheck-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(long(scaleValue),num_format));
00435         }
00436     }
00437 
00438     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00439     vga_back.bar(series_x1, xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET, series_x2+1, xAxisPos, axis_color);
00440 
00441     int shown_year=48;
00442     // show x-axis scale
00443     double actual_end;
00444     if (this_month_indicator<0)
00445         actual_end=((double)info.game_month-1)/12.0+info.game_year;
00446     else
00447         actual_end=(((double)info.game_month-1)+this_month_indicator)/12.0+info.game_year;
00448 
00449     int show_end=(int)(actual_end);
00450 
00451     short maxLabelWidth = font_ptr->text_width(m.format(show_end, 16))+COMMON_OFFSET*2;
00452     x_axis_step = ((float)series_x2-series_x1) / (shown_year-1);
00453 
00454     double actual_start = actual_end-(double)(info.graph_month)/12.0;
00455 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00456     // if finanical year
00457     // draw yr.i at i+(8.0/12.0) which is > actual_start
00458     // then i > actual_start-(8.0/12.0)
00459     // double financialYearOffset = ((financial.fiscal_year_start_month-1.0)/12.0); // for year start in sept
00460     double financialYearOffset = 8.0/12.0;          // for year start in sept
00461     int show_start = (int)(actual_start - financialYearOffset) + 1;
00462     double show_year_offset = (double)show_start + financialYearOffset - actual_start;
00463 #else
00464     double show_year_offset=1.0-(actual_start-(int)actual_start)-1.0/12.0;
00465     int show_start=(int)(actual_start)+1;
00466 #endif
00467 
00468     show_end=show_start+4;
00469 
00470     short displayInc = 0;
00471     while (displayInc * x_axis_step * 12.0< maxLabelWidth) displayInc++;
00472 
00473     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00474     for (i = show_start; i <=show_end ; i+=displayInc) {
00475         int this_x;
00476         if((this_x = (int)(series_x1+((double)(i-show_start)+show_year_offset)*x_axis_step*12))<series_x2) {
00477             vga_back.bar(
00478                 this_x,
00479                 xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET*2,
00480                 this_x+1,
00481                 xAxisPos, axis_color);
00482             font_ptr->center_put(
00483                 this_x-maxLabelWidth/2-COMMON_OFFSET,
00484                 xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET,
00485                 this_x+maxLabelWidth/2-COMMON_OFFSET,
00486                 xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET+font_ptr->max_font_height,
00487                 m.format(i, 16));
00488         }
00489     }
00490 
00491     //---- Draw this year indicators ----//
00492     if((this_month_indicator>=0)&&(this_month_indicator<HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT))
00493         for(int j=series_y1;j<series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET;j+=8)
00494             vga_back.bar(
00495                 (int)(series_x1+(info.graph_month-this_month_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00496                 j,
00497                 (int)(series_x1+(info.graph_month-this_month_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00498                 j+4,
00499                 axis_color);
00500 }

00504 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_series ------------//
00506 void GraphMonth::draw_series() {
00507     switch (data_type_flag) {
00508     case DATA_FLOAT: draw_series_float(); break;
00509     case DATA_DOUBLE: draw_series_double(); break;
00510     case DATA_INT: draw_series_int(); break;
00511     case DATA_LONG: draw_series_long(); break;
00512     }
00513 }
00514 
00515 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::draw_series ------------//
00516 
00517 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_series_float ------------//
00519 void GraphMonth::draw_series_float() {
00520     float *dataArray = (float *) data_array;
00521     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00522 
00523     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00524         dataArray-=info.graph_month;
00525         dataArray+=HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT;
00526         prevX = series_x1;
00527         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00528 
00529         dataArray++;
00530 
00531         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00532         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_month; j++) {
00533             currX = series_x1 + (short)(j * x_axis_step);
00534             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00535 
00536             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00537 
00538             prevX = currX;
00539             prevY = currY;
00540             dataArray++;
00541         }
00542 
00543         if (value_flag)
00544             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_FLOAT);
00545     }
00546 }
00547 
00548 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::draw_series_float ------------//
00549 
00550 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_series_double ------------//
00552 void GraphMonth::draw_series_double() {
00553     double *dataArray = (double *) data_array;
00554     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00555 
00556     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00557         dataArray-=info.graph_month;
00558         dataArray+=HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT;
00559         prevX = series_x1;
00560         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00561 
00562         dataArray++;
00563 
00564         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00565         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_month; j++) {
00566             currX = series_x1 + (short)(j * x_axis_step);
00567             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00568 
00569             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00570 
00571             prevX = currX;
00572             prevY = currY;
00573             dataArray++;
00574         }
00575 
00576         if (value_flag)
00577             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_DOUBLE);
00578     }
00579 }

00583 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_series_int ------------//
00585 void GraphMonth::draw_series_int() {

00588 
00589     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00590         dataArray-=info.graph_month;
00591         dataArray+=HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT;
00592         prevX = series_x1;
00593         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00594 
00595         dataArray++;
00596 
00597         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00598         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_month; j++) {
00599             currX = series_x1 + (short)(j * x_axis_step);
00600             currY = (short)(xAxisPos-(int)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc));
00601 
00602             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00603 
00604             prevX = currX;
00605             prevY = currY;
00606             dataArray++;
00607         }
00608 
00609         if (value_flag)
00610             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_INT);
00611     }
00612 }
00613 
00614 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::draw_series_int ------------//
00615 
00616 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_series_long ------------//
00618 void GraphMonth::draw_series_long() {
00619     long *dataArray = (long *) data_array;
00620     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00621 
00622     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00623         dataArray-=info.graph_month;
00624         dataArray+=HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT;
00625         prevX = series_x1;
00626         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00627 
00628         dataArray++;
00629 
00630         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00631         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_month; j++) {
00632             currX = series_x1 + (short)(j * x_axis_step);
00633             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00634 
00635             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00636 
00637             prevX = currX;
00638             prevY = currY;
00639             dataArray++;
00640         }
00641 
00642         if (value_flag)
00643             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_LONG);
00644     }
00645 }
00646 
00647 //------------ End of function GraphMonth::draw_series_float ------------//

00649 //---------- Begin of function GraphMonth::draw_value -------------------//
00651 void GraphMonth::draw_value(void *value, int color, short x, short y, int dataType) {
00652     char *valueString;
00653     switch (data_type_flag) {
00654     case DATA_FLOAT:
00655         valueString = m.format(*((float *) value), num_format); break;
00656     case DATA_DOUBLE:
00657         valueString = m.format(*((double *) value), num_format); break;
00658     case DATA_INT:
00659         valueString = m.format(*((int *) value), num_format); break;
00660     case DATA_LONG:
00661         valueString = m.format(*((long *) value), num_format); break;
00662     }
00663 
00664     short textHeight = font_news.max_font_height;
00665     short textWidth = font_news.text_width(valueString) + 1;
00666     /*  
00667         short *bitmap = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00668         err_when( (2 + textWidth * textHeight) * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE );
00669         *bitmap++ = textWidth;
00670         *bitmap++ = textHeight;
00671 
00672         short *shortPtr = bitmap;
00673         for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00674         *shortPtr++ = transparent_code_w;
00675 
00676         font_news.put_to_bufferW(bitmap, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, valueString);
00677 
00678         shortPtr = bitmap;
00679         for (i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++, shortPtr++)
00680         if (*shortPtr != transparent_code_w)

00682 
00683         vga_back.put_bitmapW_trans(x, y, (short *) sys.common_data_buf);
00684     */
00685     font_chartsm.put(x+3,y,valueString);
00686 }
